oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robert Flournoy interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Flourney, Robert; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Robert Flourney served in Vietnam as a field artillery unit forward observer from September 1971 to July 1972.
